description:
"I'll be doing my first time today," Forrest said. "Receiving."
There was some nervous laughter between him and Cooper.
"I'll be gentle," Cooper said. "Don't worry."
Ah, the patter of the first time.
"You've never done anything with a guy?" our camera guy asked in a soothing voice.
"Nothing. First. Ever."
Cooper laughed.
"I hear he's a stud, so..." Forrest said, referring to Cooper.
The "so" meant that Forrest was going to get his hairy hole fucked!
title: Forrest & Cooper
